title: fly from London to Sao Paulo
code with Pedro on Recline.
leave at 6am on Hacker Bus on 16h trip from Sao Paulo to Brasilia. Make major improvements to Recline.
attend Open Government Partnership meeting in Brasilia presenting in two sessions and moderating another

attend GIFT (Global Initiative on Financial Transparency) meeting with fellow OKFN-ers Lucy Chambers and Velichka Dimitrova in order to present Technology and Transparency in relation to Participatory Finance report
fly from Brasilia to Sao Paulo
present about Open Knowledge Foundation at evening workshop organized by Everton of Open Knowledge Foundation Brasil
visit Camara de Sao Paulo (municipal government of Sao Paulo) and meet with Police Neto (President of Camara)
participate in 2 day hack day at Casa da Cultura Digital with Daniela da Silva and others
Dados Abertos Sao Paulo meetup
meet with Perlmongers and Tiago Rondon re OpenSpending for Sao Paulo and
visit INPE and give a presentation on the Open Knowledge Foundation. Discuss PyBossa and the ForestWatchers project.
spend the day with IT3S discussing CSO needs, CKAN and Mootiro
Papo con Dados - half-day meeting on and civic issues ~ 15 attendees. Produce ...
meet with Patrizia and the Duke for a half-day coding session
visit Paulo Markun and discuss open data, visualization and civic issues.
Fly from Sao Paulo to Rio de Janerio for Rio conference on Services for Cities and the LLGA ceremony
LLGA ceremony begins
all day at Living Labs event. Give a 1m pitch and present at session on ...
Dados Abertos meet up in Rio de Janerio co-hosted with Ibase and co-organized with Natalia
meet with ... from IPEA
attend FGV and meet with Ronaldo Lemos and colleagues. Given a presentation on the Open Knowledge Foundation and Open Knowledge Foundation Brasil
19h flight from Rio de Janerio to San Francisco
meet with Max Ogden, Jessica Lord and Randall Leeds for an afternoon of coding and discussion at noisebridge
meet with Max Ogden and ... . Visit Wikimedia and meet with Dario Tarobelli. Meet with Lisa ... from Common Crawl, visit CfA offices.
attend ONEF 2012

meet with CfA and give a short presentation on the Open Knowledge Foundation. Meet with Hypothes.is to discuss next steps around the Annotator, AnnotateIt.org and Hypothes.is. Plan to meet with David Huynh but unfortunately last minute changes mean this is impossible.
flight back to UK
